name: TokiniAndyBot
description: A Discord bot overseeing the TokiniAndy server (A Japanese learning server) by organizing weekly schedules, greeting new users, etc...

name: Synthboard

name: Fit-tastic (OwlHacks 2023)
description: Developed a website that promotes healthy eating habits by providing users with various shopping list, meal suggestions and recipes based on their current ingredients. Winner for the Best Health and Wellness category.

name: ISIP Picone Press Website
description: Created a website from scratch for ISIP Picone Press Research Lab. The site features valuable research findings and updates. It's a user-friendly platform for sharing their work with the world.
